definitions.example: Smoking in the restaurant is forbidden.

definitions.definition: (ditransitive) To deny, exclude from, or warn off, by express command.
To oppose, hinder, or prevent, as if by an effectual command.
definitions.example: An impassable river forbids the approach of the army.
What part of "no" do you forbid to understand?

definitions.definition: The act by which something is forbidden; a prohibition.
Appearing to be threatening, unfriendly or potentially unpleasant.
